Discussion
1.

A refilling Zoning Petition Has been received from Joseph T. Maguire of Alexandria Real Estate
Equities, Inc. transmitting a proposed revised amendment to the zoning ordinance by creating the
Grand Junction Pathway Overlay District.

2.

A communication was received from Pamela Van Dort, 13 Cornelius Way, regarding the Grand
Junction Overlay upzoning petition.

A communication was received from Sheli Wortis, 106 Berkshire St. 02141, regarding Alexandria
Petition
